pr_title: Enable parallel feature activiation for JCA / Connectors

timeline.bodyText: Do you want to do io.openliberty.connectors.resourcedefinition.messaging-3.0.feature as well?
timeline.author: jhanders34
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -10,3 +10,4 @@ IBM-Provision-Capability: osgi.identity; filter:="(&(type=osgi.subsystem.feature
 IBM-Install-Policy: when-satisfied
 kind=ga
 edition=base
+WLP-Activation-Type: parallel

replies.bodyText: @dazavala is working on the messaging-3.0 feature.  I'll leave the messaging features out of this update for now.
replies.author: KyleAure

replies.bodyText: Nevermind, I thought was was referring to the public feature.  Updated :)
replies.author: KyleAure

timeline.bodyText:
Do you want to also update com.ibm.websphere.appserver.javax.connector-1.6.feature and
com.ibm.websphere.appserver.javax.connector-1.7.feature?
timeline.author: jhanders34
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -13,3 +13,4 @@ IBM-API-Package: jakarta.resource; type="spec", \
 -bundles=io.openliberty.jakarta.connectors.2.0; location:="dev/api/spec/,lib/"; mavenCoordinates="jakarta.resource:jakarta.resource-api:2.0.0"
 kind=beta
 edition=base
+WLP-Activation-Type: parallel

timeline.bodyText: Do you also want to update com.ibm.websphere.appserver.javax.connector.internal-1.6.feature?
timeline.author: jhanders34
